summary: Completed comprehensive testing of L4.1 Daily Run Orchestrator. Backend APIs fully functional with all 30 tests passing. Frontend UI component exists but not accessible without admin credentials.

integration_issues.issue: UI component not accessible from main interface
integration_issues.details: Daily Run card requires admin credentials to access, not visible in main Fractal interface

passed_tests: All 10 pipeline steps execute in correct order (SNAPSHOT_WRITE → OUTCOME_RESOLVE → LIVE_SAMPLE_UPDATE → DRIFT_CHECK → LIFECYCLE_HOOKS → WARMUP_PROGRESS_WRITE → AUTO_PROMOTE → INTEL_TIMELINE_WRITE → ALERTS_DISPATCH → INTEGRITY_GUARD)
Step timing captured for all steps
Response includes runId, asset, mode, durationMs, steps, lifecycle fields
Pipeline executes and completes within reasonable time (8-21ms)
All step results include timing and success status
Lifecycle integration captures status changes correctly
Error handling for invalid assets works properly
action_item_for_main_agent: Frontend L4DailyRunCard component exists but requires admin authentication to access. Consider either: 1) Adding admin login functionality to tests, 2) Making the Daily Run UI accessible without admin credentials, or 3) Providing test credentials for frontend testing. Backend functionality is 100% working.
